channel.title: [PI] Ground items
channel.description: Ok so i did some checking around and i can't find any help on how to do this correctly. Im trying to set up an area that is similar to a party room that drops items there. I cannot figure out how to set this up though. How would i set up something that spawns items from a list and randomly place it in an area of my choosing? If you're willing to just help me out with the spawn thing so that it automatically spawns when i turn my server one that would be fine. It would also be helpful if there was a respawn timer one it too though :p thanks for any help. Im using Project Insanity too btw.

item.title: [PI] Ground items
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

why don’t you just add party room then lol
